body_html: Yes, we're trying to keep the number of symbols down, sorry for the confusion. Using Layers from tf.keras.layers is good too (there shouldn't be much difference and they'll both work with tf.keras.Model, but we're slowly migrating toward the tf.keras.layers versions).
body_text: Yes, we're trying to keep the number of symbols down, sorry for the confusion. Using Layers from tf.keras.layers is good too (there shouldn't be much difference and they'll both work with tf.keras.Model, but we're slowly migrating toward the tf.keras.layers versions).
body: Yes, we're trying to keep the number of symbols down, sorry for the confusion. Using Layers from `tf.keras.layers` is good too (there shouldn't be much difference and they'll both work with `tf.keras.Model`, but we're slowly migrating toward the `tf.keras.layers` versions).
